Aha... thank you, that thread got me there.
In short, I hadn't ticked "you can become this object" as it wasn't ticked by default so I hadn't thought it necessary as I have no plans of switching perspective. But doing this popped up the "Player" tab and the rest was obvious.
I knew it would be something silly. THANK YOU!
